name: Hashire Hebereke: EX
summary: Hashire Hebereke: EX is a modern remake of the 1994-released Super Famicom racing action game Hashire Hebereke by SUNSOFT. Players can choose from comical and cute characters like series protagonist Hebe and partake in extreme races across unique stages. While carrying over elements from the original game, it will add a new Time Attack mode, new characters, and new stages, as well as four-person online multiplayer support.
